title: From foam to bone: Plant cellulose can pave the way for healthy bone implants

title_detail.value: From foam to bone: Plant cellulose can pave the way for healthy bone implants

summary: Researchers have developed what could be the bone implant material of the future: an airy, foamlike substance from plant cellulose that can be injected into the body and provide scaffolding for the growth of new bone.

summary_detail.value: Researchers have developed what could be the bone implant material of the future: an airy, foamlike substance from plant cellulose that can be injected into the body and provide scaffolding for the growth of new bone.
